reviewText: UPDATE: BD available! Samson & Delilah [Blu-ray] Fans of Hedy Lamarr's will welcome a DVD release of this 1949 Cecil B. de Mille picture. DVD enthusiasts may not be so pleased as this is a transfer taken from analog tape which presents this classic movie in a somewhat faded and soft image. Orig. run time is 131 min (imdb), DVD with PAL speedup (4%) plays 127 min. Film: 5,5/10 Picture quality: 5/10 (46" screen) Aspect ratio: 4:3 (orig. 1,37:1) Run time PAL 50Hz: 2 07'13" Audio: I;GB ST: - RC 2 Chpt. 12 No extras Studio: A & R PRODUCTIONS AND DISTRIBUTION SNC
